meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Frank Sitarski Alice Rote Kalyan Farrington Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2801.

td.p: Frank Sitarski, a manager from Plainville, Massachusetts
Alice Rote, a high school teacher from Doylestown, Ohio
Kalyan Farrington, a retired engineer from Honolulu, Hawaii (whose 3-day cash winnings total $26,955)

tr.td: BIBLICAL JEALOUSY
COMMERCIALS
QUOTATIONS
DANCE
ANNUAL EVENTS
"M"ENAGERIE
